title: "AI TECHNOLOGY TO CONTRIBUTE UP TO 70% OF CARBON EMISSIONS REDUCTIONS BY 2060: IDC AND BAIDU WHITE PAPER"
excerpt: "(NASDAQ: BIDU and HKEX: 9888) and IDC jointly launched China's first White Paper on AI's Contribution to Achieving the \"Dual Carbon\" Goals in 2021 on December 29. The white paper estimates that AI-related technologies will contribute to reducing more than 35 billion tons of carbon emissions from now to 2060."
